author: Al Jazeera
title: France seizes cargo ship targeted by US sanctions on Russia
description: The seizing of the “Baltic Leader” is of the first visible displays of the West enforcing sanctions on Moscow.
content: France has seized a car cargo ship in the English Channel that the United States says was linked to the son of a former Russian spy chief, in one of the first visible displays of the West enforcing s… [+2168 chars]
